title: AUTH should error when requirepass is not set.
body: Currently, if you issue an AUTH <string> command to a redis server when requirepass is not set, it does not raise an error.  I think that this should raise an error, as it means the client and the server have mis-matched expectations about what the passphrase should be.

comments_data.body: Fixed on unstable and 2.4. Thanks! Closing the issue.
